cast.overview: Following the death of the Leigh family matriarch, Annie and her children uncover disturbing secrets about their heritage. Their daily lives are not only impacted, but they also become entangled in a chilling fate from which they cannot escape, driving them to the brink of madness.
cast.title: Hereditary

details.biography:
Mallory Bechtel (born November 26, 1999) is an American musical theatre actress in New York. She has performed as lead and understudy in several musicals, including the Tony Award-winning Dear Evan Hansen on Broadway. She has also appeared in multiple television shows and films. In 2022, she starred as twins Karen and Kelly Beasley on the Max series Pretty Little Liars: Original Sin. 

Bechtel was nominated at Broadway.com Audience Awards in 2019 as Zoe Murphy in Dear Evan Hansen.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Mallory Bechtel, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Mallory Bechtel
